creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text: For listboxes that have multiple selections the use of setproperty ... property="*" does not call the method with the array signature. (This bug doesnt happen on 1.2.2 jvms).

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
A quick test in Tomcat 3.3 shows this to be fixed. I believe this fix is
in Tomcat 3.2.3 as well.
